Directions: In a mixing bowl, combine the sugar, eggs and vanilla; mix well.  Add butter; mix well.  Combine the flour, cocoa and salt; add to butter mixture just until combined.  Stir in nuts.  Spread into a greased microwave-safe 8-in. square dish.
Microwave, uncovered, on high for 6-7 minutes or until top appears dry and springs back when lightly touched, rotating a quarter turn every 2 minutes.  Dust with confectioners' sugar if desired.
